channel.title: The Tale of How
channel.description:
Okay so I was looking for some inspiration because I wanted to make something in photoshop and somehow I stumbled upon this little film in the big sea of "teh internetz" After watching it about three times and still picking out little details I decided "the people must know of this!" And so I am here to paste a link to this nice lickle film I found.
[center]http://theblackheartgang.com/the-household/the-tale-of-how/[/center]

item.title: The Tale of How
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Yeh same… wierd style. Its some wierd story but I was just amazed at how they put 2d images, 3d animation and real life video clips and blended it all together.
